00025 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 // Function: PortmapDialog()
00027 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 PortmapDialog::PortmapDialog(LibraryInterface* libInterface, QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00029                              BusInterface* busIf, BusInterface* otherBusIf,
00030                              QWidget* parent) : QDialog(parent), busIf_(busIf), otherBusIf_(otherBusIf)
00031 {
00032     Q_ASSERT(libInterface != 0);
00033     Q_ASSERT(component != 0);
00034     Q_ASSERT(busIf != 0);
00035     Q_ASSERT(otherBusIf != 0);
00036 
00037     setWindowTitle(tr("Define Port Maps"));
00038 
00039     // Create the port map widget.
00040     portmapWidget_ = new BusIfPortmapTab(libInterface, component, busIf, this);
00041     portmapWidget_->setAbsType(busIf->getAbstractionType(), busIf->getInterfaceMode());
00042 
00043     // Create a separator.
00044     QGroupBox* separator = new QGroupBox(this);
00045     separator->setFlat(true);
00046 
00047     // Create the buttons and their layout.
00048     QPushButton* btnOk = new QPushButton(tr("OK") , this);
00049     QPushButton* btnCancel = new QPushButton(tr("Cancel"), this);
00050 
00051     QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00052     buttonLayout->addStretch(1);
00053     buttonLayout->addWidget(btnOk);
00054     buttonLayout->addWidget(btnCancel);
00055 
00056     // Create the main layout.
00057     QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00058     mainLayout->addWidget(portmapWidget_);
00059     mainLayout->addWidget(separator);
00060     mainLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00061 
00062     connect(btnOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00063     connect(btnCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()));
00064 }
00065

00067 // Function: ~PortmapDialog()
00068 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 PortmapDialog::~PortmapDialog()
00070 {
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 // Function: accept()
00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 void PortmapDialog::accept()
00078 {
00079     // Check if the port map settings are invalid.
00080     if (!portmapWidget_->isValid())
00081     {
00082         return;
00083     }
00084 
00085     // Apply the changes to the bus interface.
00086     portmapWidget_->applyChanges();
00087 
00088     // Check if all required logical ports are not mapped.
00089     QList<QString> missingMappings;
00090 
00091     foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, otherBusIf_->getPortMaps())
00092     {
00093         bool found = false;
00094         
00095         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> localPortMap, busIf_->getPortMaps())
00096         {
00097             // The logical port was mapped correctly if the bus interface has a
00098             // port map that utilizes the same logical port.
00099             if (localPortMap->logicalPort_ == portMap->logicalPort_)
00100             {
00101                 found = true;
00102                 break;
00103             }
00104         }
00105 
00106         // If the corresponding port map was not found, add the logical port to the list
00107         // of missing mappings.
00108         if (!found)
00109         {
00110             missingMappings.append(portMap->logicalPort_);
00111         }
00112     }
00113 
00114     // If there were missing mapping, show an error message.
00115     if (!missingMappings.empty())
00116     {
00117         QString detailMessage = tr("The following logical ports must be mapped:");
00118 
00119         foreach (QString const& name, missingMappings)
00120         {
00121             detailMessage += "\n * " + name;
00122         }
00123 
00124         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00125                            tr("Some required port maps are missing."), QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00126         msgBox.setDetailedText(detailMessage);
00127         msgBox.exec();
00128         return;
00129     }
00130 
00131     QDialog::accept();
00132 }
